title: 250th Anniversary of the Founding of the United States Navy
summary: The document is a presidential proclamation marking the 250th anniversary of the founding of the United States Navy. It highlights the Navy's pivotal role in safeguarding the nation's sovereignty and projecting its power globally. The proclamation commemorates the establishment of the Continental Navy on October 13, 1775, and honors the generations of Sailors who have served with valor. It also reaffirms the importance of a strong naval force, quoting George Washington's assertion that a decisive naval force is essential for national security. The President proclaims October 13, 2025, as a day to honor the Navy's heritage and the patriotism of those who have served.
